item.title: Solar Shop
item.description:
Equipment for generating solar energy is sold in the online Solar Shop. The objective of the Solar Shop is to allow dealers to quickly order equipment with minimal human intervention.

Auroville Energy Products is an organization that sells equipment for renewable energy to customers all over India. This includes solar panels, batteries, solar chargers, inverters, and all the accessories needed to set up a complete solar energy generating system. Their customers are mainly dealers and installers, but some end-users also buy equipment for their private installations. Dealers can receive discounts if they sign up with their company details and demonstrate sufficient knowledge to become resellers. To help them, Auroville Energy Products provides training for new dealers and their employees.

item.title: kNOw PLASTICS online game
item.description:
kNOwPLASTICS Online Game is a multi-player memory game based on Memory, also known as Concentration, Pelmanism, Shinkei-suijaku, or Pairs. The objective is to find matching pairs of cards. We developed both the game engine and the in-browser app.

WasteLess India is a non-profit social enterprise based in Auroville, South India. Their mission is to transform the way we think about waste by promoting responsible waste management and environmental sustainability. They developed an educational program, kNOwPLASTICS, which includes a memory game. Teachers can use the multi-week program to educate young students (6-12 years) on the importance of reducing the use of unsafe and single-use plastics.
